issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Document fsck -blockId and -storagepolicy options in branch-2.7

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.summary: fsck "-storagepolicies , -blockId ,-replicaDetails " options are missed out in usage and from documentation

Testcase failures are not related to this patch.
Please review.
HDFS-7993 is also merged to branch-2. So {{-replicaDetails}} option is available in branch-2 as well.

Thanks [~vinayrpet] for merging HDFS-7993 to branch-2. 
Now the patch provided for this issue (HDFS-8256) can be applied on both trunk and branch-2. 
Please review the patch.
Patch no longer applies. Sending back to the TBR queue.

Thanks [~aw] for looking at this issue.
Updated the patch file.
Please review.

Latest patch looks good to me. +1.
Will commit shortly.

Committed to trunk and branch-2.

Resolved conflict while cherry-picking to branch-2 due to missing option '-showprogress' in branch-2.
Attaching the committed branch-2 patch.
Thanks for the contribution [~andreina].
